item.description:
We're returning to Oliveira's for another affordable night of Brazilian dining with friendly, warm folks.

Highly recommend their rodizio, which is an all you can eat meal for less than $17 (does NOT include drinks, dessert, tax nor tip). Servers bring swords of meat to our tables. In addition there is an abundant selection of delicious fare from a self serve buffet bar.

You're more than welcome to order from the a la carte menu or pay for your meal by weight.

After 7:30 live Brazilian music begins in the main dining room by Anna and Bill of Receita de Samba. They perform wonderful, soft, sweet Bossa Nova, Jazz and Samba which I believe will add to your Brazilian experience. Check out the following link to hear a sample of their music, http://www.myspace.com/receitadesamba/music

 

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE YOU MUST ANSWER THE QUESTIONS WHICH APPEAR AFTER YOU RSVP YES or WAIT LIST. 
IF YOU RSVP NO YOU DO NOT NEED TO ANSWER THE QUESTIONS.

 

WE WILL BE SEATED AT TABLES OF SIX (6) OR LESS FOR EASIER RODIZIO SERVING AS WELL AS MANAGEABLE CONVERSATIONS.

YOU'RE WELCOME AND ENCOURAGED TO TABLE HOP.

 

Oliveira's is clean, the food fresh, and the prices very reasonable. 

Each time we dine here the wait staff provide attentive, helpful and prompt service.

 

Public Transit: 
Orange Line subway to Sullivan Station then 
Bus 109 Linden Sq Via Broadway then 
get off at Broadway & Gladstone Terrace

Directions: 
Check out Google to arrange your driving directions.

Parking: 
Available on Broadway and behind Oliveira's Restaurant as well as the shopping center (Family Dollar and Walgreens are the main stores) which is behind the gas station next to Oliveira's.

We'll be joined by members of the Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch and Dinner and Onyxbirds Meetup groups as well.

 

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced.

 

I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, you just don't want to be around people or whatever the reason. My only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

 

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST contact me by calling or texting me at (617) 445-7549 or email at snowrover@yahoo.com

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first reserved basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If dinner is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will automatically be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the dinner and you have not attended, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update dinner confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the dinner, without contacting me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 6:45 PM to confirm seating and welcome you.
